resources.string: Do you want to Polo back?
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
You are currently logged in as:
This polo has nulled out; ignore it
What would you like to say?
You currently have an active polo, please cancel it before marcoing!
You already have a Marco!\nCreating a new Marco will overwrite the current one.
Your friends list is empty.\nTry sending a public marco!
You have to enter a message!
You can\'t add yourself as a friend!
"You have blocked this user!\nUnblock them first to add as a friend.
Syncing your contacts to your account will add any existing users\nwho currently have an account here to your friends list.\n Do you want to sync your phone contacts to your friends list?
Do you want to delete your current Marco?
Marco Polo is a location enabled social app, designed to make meeting up with your friends easier!\n
To share your location with a friend you can send them a Marco. There are two types of Marcos, public and private.\n

A public Marco will be shared with everyone that uses the Marco Polo App.
 To create a public marco tap Marco on the main page and enter a description of the event you are marking.
 Keep in mind you may only have one public Marco at a time.

A private Marco will be shared only with the people that you choose. To create a private Marco tap Marco on the main page and tap the switch at the top.
 Then you can enter a message to send with your location.
 Finally you may select the friends that you wish to send the Marco to!
 A few things to keep in mind:
 		 Your friends will have to Polo back to you to signify that they will be joining you.
 		 If you do not have any friends you can not send a private Marco.

When a friend sends you a Marco you will need to let them know if you will be joining them.\n In order to do this, you can tap "accept" from the dialog box that pops up when you receive a private Marco.\n You can also Polo to any recent Marcos through your Notifications.

To add friends you may select Friends from the main menu and search for them by name or email address. 
 If you allow this app to access your contacts then Marco Polo will attempt to automatically add contacts that also use the app to your friends list. 
 Please note that the app may not find all friends in your contacts automatically.
We can pull this from your facebook profile or feel free to write something new!
Here are the icons! They do stuff!
You have the option to sync contacts from your phone through your My Account page. We will find any emails \nin your contact list that currently have accounts with us.
